item.title: REDtalks #018 - Enabling the docker TCP API in AWS
item.description: Not a traditional REDtalks post today (no interview/demo), but this took me a while to work outÂ so I thought I’d share. What’s this about? It all started with me building REST extensibility solutions for F5 Networks in AWS.

item.title: Secure Service Networking for AWS
item.description: Design Objectives Create a Reference Architecture for Secure Service Networking best practices on the AWS Cloud Platform. Requirements Apply the Principles of Zero Trust security across multiple AWS platforms, e.g. EKS, ECS, and EC2.
